backend/main.mo: Actor implementing access‑controlled user profiles and per‑user text backups.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-to-file mapping report listing implemented features and associated components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers plus light/dark CSS variable themes for the app.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with app root, manifest, icons, and main TSX loader.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, theme colors, start URL, and icons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, layout, theme provider, and root app component.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header showing app name, online status, navigation trigger, and login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with state handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/cloud/CloudBacku: UI panel enabling upload and download of backups to cloud using actor identity with status handling.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorBann: Simple destructive alert component displaying an error title and message.
frontend/src/components/customers/Custom: Form for creating or editing a customer with validation, error handling, and submit/cancel actions.
Displays a customer's invoices with creation via sheet modal and status‑colored invoice list.
Search input component for filtering customers by name.
frontend/src/components/invoices/ImagePr: Shows preview thumbnails of selected images with zoom and remove options plus a full‑screen dialog.
frontend/src/components/invoices/Invoice: Final review step summarizing invoice data and confirming save with back and submit controls.
Form to create or edit an invoice with validation, image attachments, and a finalize step before saving.
frontend/src/components/MobileNav.tsx: Bottom mobile navigation bar linking to customers, backup, and settings.
frontend/src/components/OnlineStatusIndi: Small component showing online/offline status with icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, auto‑refreshing queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state, creating AuthClient instances, and exposing identity, login, and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Custom hook that tracks and returns the browser’s online/offline status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for loading and saving the current user's profile using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables and styling for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/backup/backupFormat.ts: Defines the backup payload structure and provides functions to create and validate backup data.
frontend/src/lib/backup/exportBackup.ts: Exports all offline data as a JSON backup file for download.
frontend/src/lib/backup/importBackup.ts: Imports and validates a backup file, restoring customers, invoices, and images.
frontend/src/lib/cloudSync/cloudSync.ts: Uploads and downloads backup data to and from a cloud actor, validating and restoring it.
frontend/src/lib/downloads/downloadUtils: Utility functions for downloading blobs or text files via the browser.
frontend/src/lib/downloads/invoiceImageB: Bundles invoice images into a JSON file by converting blobs to base64 and triggers download.
frontend/src/lib/offline/db.ts: IndexedDB wrapper implementing CRUD helpers for customers, invoices, images, and settings.
frontend/src/lib/offline/models.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for offline customer, invoice, line item, and image data models.
frontend/src/lib/offline/repository.ts: Implements offline CRUD operations for customers, invoices, images, and exporting/importing all data.
frontend/src/lib/settings/appSettings.ts: Manages app settings in localStorage, including retrieving and updating the app name.
frontend/src/lib/validation/validators.t: Provides simple validation functions for customer names, invoice numbers, and invoice totals.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/BackupRestorePage.tsx: Provides UI for exporting and importing local backups and managing cloud backups with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDetailPage.ts: Displays and manages a single customer’s details, allowing edits, deletion, and viewing related invoices.
frontend/src/pages/CustomersListPage.tsx: Lists all customers with search and supports creating new customers via a sheet form.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceDetailPage.tsx: Shows invoice details, associated customer info, and supports downloading individual or bundled invoice images.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Allows editing app settings and managing user profile information, including initial profile setup.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash-based routes) and persisting them in sessionStorage, plus utilities for clearing stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing an offline‑first customer and invoice app, including features, requirements, backup expectations, and image assets needed.
